3646class TracingAccountingAllocator : public AccountingAllocator {
3647 public:
3648 explicit TracingAccountingAllocator(Isolate* isolate) : isolate_(isolate) {}
3649 ~TracingAccountingAllocator() = default;
3650
3651 protected:
3652 void TraceAllocateSegmentImpl(v8::internal::Segment* segment) override {
3653 base::MutexGuard lock(&mutex_);
3654 UpdateMemoryTrafficAndReportMemoryUsage(segment->total_size());
3655 }
3656
3657 void TraceZoneCreationImpl(const Zone* zone) override {
3658 base::MutexGuard lock(&mutex_);
3659 active_zones_.insert(zone);
3660 nesting_depth_++;
3661 }
3662
3663 void TraceZoneDestructionImpl(const Zone* zone) override {
3664 base::MutexGuard lock(&mutex_);
3665#ifdef V8_ENABLE_PRECISE_ZONE_STATS
3666 if (v8_flags.trace_zone_type_stats) {
3667 type_stats_.MergeWith(zone->type_stats());
3668 }
3669#endif
3670 UpdateMemoryTrafficAndReportMemoryUsage(zone->segment_bytes_allocated());
3671 active_zones_.erase(zone);
3672 nesting_depth_--;
3673
3674#ifdef V8_ENABLE_PRECISE_ZONE_STATS
3675 if (v8_flags.trace_zone_type_stats && active_zones_.empty()) {
3676 type_stats_.Dump();
3677 }
3678#endif
3679 }
3680
3681 private:
3682 void UpdateMemoryTrafficAndReportMemoryUsage(size_t memory_traffic_delta) {
3683 if (!v8_flags.trace_zone_stats &&
3684 !(TracingFlags::zone_stats.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) &
3685 v8::tracing::TracingCategoryObserver::ENABLED_BY_TRACING)) {
3686 // Don't print anything if the zone tracing was enabled only because of
3687 // v8_flags.trace_zone_type_stats.
3688 return;
3689 }
3690
3691 memory_traffic_since_last_report_ += memory_traffic_delta;
3692 if (memory_traffic_since_last_report_ < v8_flags.zone_stats_tolerance)
3693 return;
3694 memory_traffic_since_last_report_ = 0;
3695
3696 Dump(buffer_, true);
3697
3698 {
3699 std::string trace_str = buffer_.str();
3700
3701 if (v8_flags.trace_zone_stats) {
3702 PrintF(
3703 "{"
3704 "\"type\": \"v8-zone-trace\", "
3705 "\"stats\": %s"
3706 "}\n",
3707 trace_str.c_str());
3708 }
3709 if (V8_UNLIKELY(
3710 TracingFlags::zone_stats.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) &
3711 v8::tracing::TracingCategoryObserver::ENABLED_BY_TRACING)) {
3712 TRACE_EVENT_INSTANT1(TRACE_DISABLED_BY_DEFAULT("v8.zone_stats"),
3713 "V8.Zone_Stats", TRACE_EVENT_SCOPE_THREAD, "stats",
3714 TRACE_STR_COPY(trace_str.c_str()));
3715 }
3716 }
3717
3718 // Clear the buffer.
3719 buffer_.str(std::string());
3720 }
3721
3722 void Dump(std::ostringstream& out, bool dump_details) {
3723 // Note: Neither isolate nor zones are locked, so be careful with accesses
3724 // as the allocator is potentially used on a concurrent thread.
3725 double time = isolate_->time_millis_since_init();
3726 out << "{"
3727 << "\"isolate\": \"" << reinterpret_cast<void*>(isolate_) << "\", "
3728 << "\"time\": " << time << ", ";
3729 size_t total_segment_bytes_allocated = 0;
3730 size_t total_zone_allocation_size = 0;
3731 size_t total_zone_freed_size = 0;
3732
3733 if (dump_details) {
3734 // Print detailed zone stats if memory usage changes direction.
3735 out << "\"zones\": [";
3736 bool first = true;
3737 for (const Zone* zone : active_zones_) {
3738 size_t zone_segment_bytes_allocated = zone->segment_bytes_allocated();
3739 size_t zone_allocation_size = zone->allocation_size_for_tracing();
3740 size_t freed_size = zone->freed_size_for_tracing();
3741 if (first) {
3742 first = false;
3743 } else {
3744 out << ", ";
3745 }
3746 out << "{"
3747 << "\"name\": \"" << zone->name() << "\", "
3748 << "\"allocated\": " << zone_segment_bytes_allocated << ", "
3749 << "\"used\": " << zone_allocation_size << ", "
3750 << "\"freed\": " << freed_size << "}";
3751 total_segment_bytes_allocated += zone_segment_bytes_allocated;
3752 total_zone_allocation_size += zone_allocation_size;
3753 total_zone_freed_size += freed_size;
3754 }
3755 out << "], ";
3756 } else {
3757 // Just calculate total allocated/used memory values.
3758 for (const Zone* zone : active_zones_) {
3759 total_segment_bytes_allocated += zone->segment_bytes_allocated();
3760 total_zone_allocation_size += zone->allocation_size_for_tracing();
3761 total_zone_freed_size += zone->freed_size_for_tracing();
3762 }
3763 }
3764 out << "\"allocated\": " << total_segment_bytes_allocated << ", "
3765 << "\"used\": " << total_zone_allocation_size << ", "
3766 << "\"freed\": " << total_zone_freed_size << "}";
3767 }
3768
3769 Isolate* const isolate_;
3770 std::atomic<size_t> nesting_depth_{0};
3771
3772 base::Mutex mutex_;
3773 std::unordered_set<const Zone*> active_zones_;
3774#ifdef V8_ENABLE_PRECISE_ZONE_STATS
3775 TypeStats type_stats_;
3776#endif
3777 std::ostringstream buffer_;
3778 // This value is increased on both allocations and deallocations.
3779 size_t memory_traffic_since_last_report_ = 0;
3780};
3781
3782#ifdef DEBUG
3783std::atomic<size_t> Isolate::non_disposed_isolates_;
3784#endif // DEBUG
3785
3786namespace {
3787bool HasFlagThatRequiresSharedHeap() {
3788 return v8_flags.shared_string_table || v8_flags.harmony_struct;
3789}
3790
3791IsolateGroup* AcquireGroupForNewIsolate() {
3792 IsolateGroup* group = IsolateGroup::AcquireGlobal();
3793 if (group) return group;
3794 return IsolateGroup::New();
3795}
3796} // namespace
3797
3798// static
3799Isolate* Isolate::New() { return Allocate(); }
3800
3801// static
3802Isolate* Isolate::Allocate() {
3803 // v8::V8::Initialize() must be called before creating any isolates.
3804 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(V8::GetCurrentPlatform());
3805 IsolateGroup* group = AcquireGroupForNewIsolate();
3806 // Allocate Isolate itself on C++ heap, ensuring page alignment.
3807 void* isolate_ptr = base::AlignedAlloc(sizeof(Isolate), kMinimumOSPageSize);
3808 // IsolateAllocator manages the virtual memory resources for the Isolate.
3809 Isolate* isolate = new (isolate_ptr) Isolate(group);
3810
3811#ifdef DEBUG
3812 non_disposed_isolates_++;
3813#endif // DEBUG
3814
3815 return isolate;
3816}
3817
3818// static
3819void Isolate::Delete(Isolate* isolate) {
3820 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(isolate);
3821 // v8::V8::Dispose() must only be called after deleting all isolates.
3822 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(V8::GetCurrentPlatform());
3823 // Temporarily set this isolate as current so that various parts of
3824 // the isolate can access it in their destructors without having a
3825 // direct pointer. We don't use Enter/Exit here to avoid
3826 // initializing the thread data.
3827 PerIsolateThreadData* saved_data = isolate->CurrentPerIsolateThreadData();
3828 Isolate* saved_isolate = isolate->TryGetCurrent();
3829 SetIsolateThreadLocals(isolate, nullptr);
3830 isolate->set_thread_id(ThreadId::Current());
3831 isolate->heap()->SetStackStart();
3832
3833 isolate->Deinit();
3834
3835#ifdef DEBUG
3836 non_disposed_isolates_--;
3837#endif // DEBUG
3838
3839 IsolateGroup* group = isolate->isolate_group();
3840 isolate->~Isolate();
3841 // Only release the group once all other Isolate members have been destroyed.
3842 group->Release();
3843 // Free the isolate itself.
3844 base::AlignedFree(isolate);
3845
3846 // Restore the previous current isolate.
3847 SetIsolateThreadLocals(saved_isolate, saved_data);
3848}
3849
3850void Isolate::SetUpFromReadOnlyArtifacts(
3851 std::shared_ptr<ReadOnlyArtifacts> artifacts, ReadOnlyHeap* ro_heap) {
3852 if (ReadOnlyHeap::IsReadOnlySpaceShared()) {
3853 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(artifacts);
3854 artifacts_ = artifacts;
3855 InitializeNextUniqueSfiId(artifacts->initial_next_unique_sfi_id());
3856 } else {
3857 DCHECK_NULL(artifacts);
3858 }
3859 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(ro_heap);
3860 DCHECK_IMPLIES(read_only_heap_ != nullptr, read_only_heap_ == ro_heap);
3861 read_only_heap_ = ro_heap;
3862 heap_.SetUpFromReadOnlyHeap(read_only_heap_);
3863}

3865v8::PageAllocator* Isolate::page_allocator() const {
3866 return isolate_group()->page_allocator();
3867}
3868
3869Isolate::Isolate(IsolateGroup* isolate_group)
3870 : isolate_data_(this, isolate_group->GetPtrComprCageBase(),
3871 isolate_group->GetTrustedPtrComprCageBase()),
3872 isolate_group_(isolate_group),
3873 id_(isolate_counter.fetch_add(1, std::memory_order_relaxed)),
3874 allocator_(new TracingAccountingAllocator(this)),
3875 traced_handles_(this),
3876 builtins_(this),
3877#if defined(DEBUG) || defined(VERIFY_HEAP)
3878 num_active_deserializers_(0),
3879#endif
3880 rail_mode_(PERFORMANCE_ANIMATION),
3881 logger_(new Logger()),
3882 detailed_source_positions_for_profiling_(v8_flags.detailed_line_info),
3883 persistent_handles_list_(new PersistentHandlesList()),
3884 jitless_(v8_flags.jitless),
3885 next_unique_sfi_id_(0),
3886 next_module_async_evaluating_ordinal_(
3887 SourceTextModule::kFirstAsyncEvaluatingOrdinal),
3888 cancelable_task_manager_(new CancelableTaskManager()) {
3889 TRACE_ISOLATE(constructor);
3890 CheckIsolateLayout();
3891
3892 // ThreadManager is initialized early to support locking an isolate
3893 // before it is entered.
3894 thread_manager_ = new ThreadManager(this);
3895
3896 handle_scope_data()->Initialize();
3897
3898#define ISOLATE_INIT_EXECUTE(type, name, initial_value) \
3899 name##_ = (initial_value);
3900 ISOLATE_INIT_LIST(ISOLATE_INIT_EXECUTE)
3901#undef ISOLATE_INIT_EXECUTE
3902
3903#define ISOLATE_INIT_ARRAY_EXECUTE(type, name, length) \
3904 memset(name##_, 0, sizeof(type) * length);
3905 ISOLATE_INIT_ARRAY_LIST(ISOLATE_INIT_ARRAY_EXECUTE)
3906#undef ISOLATE_INIT_ARRAY_EXECUTE
3907
3908 InitializeLoggingAndCounters();
3909 debug_ = new Debug(this);
3910
3911 InitializeDefaultEmbeddedBlob();
3912
3913#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
3914 // If we are in production V8 and not in mksnapshot we have to pass the
3915 // landing pad builtin to the WebAssembly TrapHandler.
3916 // TODO(ahaas): Isolate creation is the earliest point in time when builtins
3917 // are available, so we cannot set the landing pad earlier at the moment.
3918 // However, if builtins ever get loaded during process initialization time,
3919 // then the initialization of the trap handler landing pad should also go
3920 // there.
3921 // TODO(ahaas): The code of the landing pad does not have to be a builtin,
3922 // we could also just move it to the trap handler, and implement it e.g. with
3923 // inline assembly. It's not clear if that's worth it.
3924 if (Isolate::CurrentEmbeddedBlobCodeSize()) {
3925 EmbeddedData embedded_data = EmbeddedData::FromBlob();
3926 Address landing_pad =
3927 embedded_data.InstructionStartOf(Builtin::kWasmTrapHandlerLandingPad);
3928 i::trap_handler::SetLandingPad(landing_pad);
3929 }
3930#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
3931
3932 MicrotaskQueue::SetUpDefaultMicrotaskQueue(this);
3933}
3934
3935void Isolate::CheckIsolateLayout() {
3936#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
3937 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(ExternalPointerTable, base_)),
3938 Internals::kExternalPointerTableBasePointerOffset);
3939 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(TrustedPointerTable, base_)),
3940 Internals::kTrustedPointerTableBasePointerOffset);
3941 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(sizeof(ExternalPointerTable)),
3942 Internals::kExternalPointerTableSize);
3943 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(sizeof(ExternalPointerTable)),
3944 ExternalPointerTable::kSize);
3945 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(sizeof(TrustedPointerTable)),
3946 Internals::kTrustedPointerTableSize);
3947 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(sizeof(TrustedPointerTable)),
3948 TrustedPointerTable::kSize);
3949#endif
3950
3951 CHECK_EQ(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_), 0);
3952 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.stack_guard_)),
3953 Internals::kIsolateStackGuardOffset);
3954 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.is_marking_flag_)),
3955 Internals::kVariousBooleanFlagsOffset);
3956 CHECK_EQ(
3957 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.error_message_param_)),
3958 Internals::kErrorMessageParamOffset);
3959 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
3960 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.builtin_tier0_entry_table_)),
3961 Internals::kBuiltinTier0EntryTableOffset);
3962 CHECK_EQ(
3963 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.builtin_tier0_table_)),
3964 Internals::kBuiltinTier0TableOffset);
3965 CHECK_EQ(
3966 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.new_allocation_info_)),
3967 Internals::kNewAllocationInfoOffset);
3968 CHECK_EQ(
3969 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.old_allocation_info_)),
3970 Internals::kOldAllocationInfoOffset);
3971 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
3972 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.fast_c_call_caller_fp_)),
3973 Internals::kIsolateFastCCallCallerFpOffset);
3974 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
3975 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.fast_c_call_caller_pc_)),
3976 Internals::kIsolateFastCCallCallerPcOffset);
3977 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.cage_base_)),
3978 Internals::kIsolateCageBaseOffset);
3979 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
3980 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.long_task_stats_counter_)),
3981 Internals::kIsolateLongTaskStatsCounterOffset);
3982 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.stack_guard_)),
3983 Internals::kIsolateStackGuardOffset);
3984
3985 CHECK_EQ(
3986 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.thread_local_top_)),
3987 Internals::kIsolateThreadLocalTopOffset);
3988 CHECK_EQ(
3989 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.handle_scope_data_)),
3990 Internals::kIsolateHandleScopeDataOffset);
3991 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.embedder_data_)),
3992 Internals::kIsolateEmbedderDataOffset);
3993#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
3994 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
3995 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.external_pointer_table_)),
3996 Internals::kIsolateExternalPointerTableOffset);
3997#endif
3998#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
3999 CHECK_EQ(
4000 static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.trusted_cage_base_)),
4001 Internals::kIsolateTrustedCageBaseOffset);
4002
4003 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
4004 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.trusted_pointer_table_)),
4005 Internals::kIsolateTrustedPointerTableOffset);
4006
4007 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
4008 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.external_buffer_table_)),
4009 Internals::kIsolateExternalBufferTableOffset);
4010#endif
4011 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(
4012 OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.api_callback_thunk_argument_)),
4013 Internals::kIsolateApiCallbackThunkArgumentOffset);
4014 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(
4015 Isolate, isolate_data_.continuation_preserved_embedder_data_)),
4016 Internals::kContinuationPreservedEmbedderDataOffset);
4017
4018 CHECK_EQ(static_cast<int>(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_.roots_table_)),
4019 Internals::kIsolateRootsOffset);
4020
4021 CHECK(IsAligned(reinterpret_cast<Address>(&isolate_data_),
4022 kIsolateDataAlignment));
4023
4024 static_assert(Internals::kStackGuardSize == sizeof(StackGuard));
4025 static_assert(Internals::kBuiltinTier0TableSize ==
4026 Builtins::kBuiltinTier0Count * kSystemPointerSize);
4027 static_assert(Internals::kBuiltinTier0EntryTableSize ==
4028 Builtins::kBuiltinTier0Count * kSystemPointerSize);
4029
4030 // Ensure that certain hot IsolateData fields fall into the same CPU cache
4031 // line.
4032 constexpr size_t kCacheLineSize = 64;
4033 static_assert(OFFSET_OF(Isolate, isolate_data_) == 0);
4034
4035 // Fields written on every CEntry/CallApiCallback/CallApiGetter call.
4036 // See MacroAssembler::EnterExitFrame/LeaveExitFrame.
4037 constexpr size_t kCEntryFPCacheLine = RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(
4038 OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, thread_local_top_.c_entry_fp_));
4039 static_assert(kCEntryFPCacheLine ==
4040 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(
4041 OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, thread_local_top_.c_function_)));
4042 static_assert(kCEntryFPCacheLine ==
4043 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(
4044 OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, thread_local_top_.context_)));
4045 static_assert(
4046 kCEntryFPCacheLine ==
4047 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(OFFSET_OF(
4048 IsolateData, thread_local_top_.topmost_script_having_context_)));
4049 static_assert(kCEntryFPCacheLine ==
4050 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(
4051 OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, thread_local_top_.last_api_entry_)));
4052
4053 // Fields written on every MacroAssembler::CallCFunction call.
4054 static_assert(RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(
4055 OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, fast_c_call_caller_fp_)) ==
4056 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(
4057 OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, fast_c_call_caller_pc_)));
4058
4059 // LinearAllocationArea objects must not cross cache line boundary.
4060 static_assert(
4061 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, new_allocation_info_)) ==
4062 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, new_allocation_info_) +
4063 sizeof(LinearAllocationArea) - 1));
4064 static_assert(
4065 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, old_allocation_info_)) ==
4066 RoundDown<kCacheLineSize>(OFFSET_OF(IsolateData, old_allocation_info_) +
4067 sizeof(LinearAllocationArea) - 1));
4068}

4070void Isolate::ClearSerializerData() {
4071 delete external_reference_map_;
4072 external_reference_map_ = nullptr;
4073}

4075// When profiling status changes, call this function to update the single bool
4076// cache.
4077void Isolate::UpdateLogObjectRelocation() {
4078 log_object_relocation_ = v8_flags.verify_predictable ||
4079 IsLoggingCodeCreation() ||
4080 v8_file_logger()->is_logging() ||
4081 (heap_profiler() != nullptr &&
4082 heap_profiler()->is_tracking_object_moves()) ||
4083 heap()->has_heap_object_allocation_tracker();

4085
4086void Isolate::Deinit() {
4087 TRACE_ISOLATE(deinit);
4088
4089#if defined(V8_USE_PERFETTO)
4090 PerfettoLogger::UnregisterIsolate(this);
4091#endif // defined(V8_USE_PERFETTO)
4092
4093 // All client isolates should already be detached when the shared heap isolate
4094 // tears down.
4095 if (is_shared_space_isolate()) {
4096 global_safepoint()->AssertNoClientsOnTearDown();
4097 }
4098
4099 if (has_shared_space() && !is_shared_space_isolate()) {
4100 IgnoreLocalGCRequests ignore_gc_requests(heap());
4101 main_thread_local_heap()->BlockMainThreadWhileParked([this]() {
4102 shared_space_isolate()->global_safepoint()->clients_mutex_.Lock();
4103 });
4104 }
4105
4106 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
4107 IgnoreLocalGCRequests ignore_gc_requests(heap());
4108
4109 tracing_cpu_profiler_.reset();
4110 if (v8_flags.stress_sampling_allocation_profiler > 0) {
4111 heap_profiler()->StopSamplingHeapProfiler();
4112 }
4113
4114 metrics_recorder_->NotifyIsolateDisposal();
4115 recorder_context_id_map_.clear();
4116
4117 FutexEmulation::IsolateDeinit(this);
4118 if (v8_flags.harmony_struct) {
4119 JSSynchronizationPrimitive::IsolateDeinit(this);
4120 } else {
4121 DCHECK(async_waiter_queue_nodes_.empty());
4122 }
4123
4124 debug()->Unload();
4125
4126#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
4127 wasm::GetWasmEngine()->DeleteCompileJobsOnIsolate(this);
4128
4129 BackingStore::RemoveSharedWasmMemoryObjects(this);
4130#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
4131
4132 if (concurrent_recompilation_enabled()) {
4133 optimizing_compile_dispatcher_->Stop();
4134 delete optimizing_compile_dispatcher_;
4135 optimizing_compile_dispatcher_ = nullptr;
4136 }
4137
4138 if (v8_flags.print_deopt_stress) {
4139 PrintF(stdout, "=== Stress deopt counter: %u\n", stress_deopt_count_);
4140 }
4141
4142 // We must stop the logger before we tear down other components.
4143 sampler::Sampler* sampler = v8_file_logger_->sampler();
4144 if (sampler && sampler->IsActive()) sampler->Stop();
4145 v8_file_logger_->StopProfilerThread();
4146
4147 FreeThreadResources();
4148
4149 // We start with the heap tear down so that releasing managed objects does
4150 // not cause a GC.
4151 heap_.StartTearDown();
4152
4153 // Stop concurrent tasks before destroying resources since they might still
4154 // use those.
4155 cancelable_task_manager()->CancelAndWait();
4156
4157 // Cancel all compiler tasks.
4158#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SPARKPLUG
4159 delete baseline_batch_compiler_;
4160 baseline_batch_compiler_ = nullptr;
4161#endif // V8_ENABLE_SPARKPLUG
4162
4163#ifdef V8_ENABLE_MAGLEV
4164 delete maglev_concurrent_dispatcher_;
4165 maglev_concurrent_dispatcher_ = nullptr;
4166#endif // V8_ENABLE_MAGLEV
4167
4168 if (lazy_compile_dispatcher_) {
4169 lazy_compile_dispatcher_->AbortAll();
4170 lazy_compile_dispatcher_.reset();
4171 }
4172
4173 // At this point there are no more background threads left in this isolate.
4174 heap_.safepoint()->AssertMainThreadIsOnlyThread();
4175
4176 // Tear down data that requires the shared heap before detaching.
4177 heap_.TearDownWithSharedHeap();
4178
4179 // Detach from the shared heap isolate and then unlock the mutex.
4180 if (has_shared_space() && !is_shared_space_isolate()) {
4181 GlobalSafepoint* global_safepoint =
4182 this->shared_space_isolate()->global_safepoint();
4183 global_safepoint->RemoveClient(this);
4184 global_safepoint->clients_mutex_.Unlock();
4185 }
4186
4187 shared_space_isolate_.reset();
4188
4189 // Since there are no other threads left, we can lock this mutex without any
4190 // ceremony. This signals to the tear down code that we are in a safepoint.
4191 base::RecursiveMutexGuard safepoint(&heap_.safepoint()->local_heaps_mutex_);
4192
4193 ReleaseSharedPtrs();
4194
4195 builtins_.TearDown();
4196 bootstrapper_->TearDown();
4197
4198 if (tiering_manager_ != nullptr) {
4199 delete tiering_manager_;
4200 tiering_manager_ = nullptr;
4201 }
4202
4203 delete heap_profiler_;
4204 heap_profiler_ = nullptr;
4205
4206#if USE_SIMULATOR
4207 delete simulator_data_;
4208 simulator_data_ = nullptr;
4209#endif
4210
4211 // After all concurrent tasks are stopped, we know for sure that stats aren't
4212 // updated anymore.
4213 DumpAndResetStats();
4214
4215 heap_.TearDown();
4216
4217 delete inner_pointer_to_code_cache_;
4218 inner_pointer_to_code_cache_ = nullptr;
4219
4220 main_thread_local_isolate_.reset();
4221
4222 FILE* logfile = v8_file_logger_->TearDownAndGetLogFile();
4223 if (logfile != nullptr) base::Fclose(logfile);
4224
4225#if defined(V8_OS_WIN) && defined(V8_ENABLE_ETW_STACK_WALKING)
4226 if (v8_flags.enable_etw_stack_walking) {
4227 ETWJITInterface::RemoveIsolate(this);
4228 }
4229#endif // defined(V8_OS_WIN)
4230
4231#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
4232 wasm::GetWasmEngine()->RemoveIsolate(this);
4233
4234 delete wasm_code_look_up_cache_;
4235 wasm_code_look_up_cache_ = nullptr;
4236#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
4237
4238 TearDownEmbeddedBlob();
4239
4240 delete interpreter_;
4241 interpreter_ = nullptr;
4242
4243 delete ast_string_constants_;
4244 ast_string_constants_ = nullptr;
4245
4246 delete logger_;
4247 logger_ = nullptr;
4248
4249 delete root_index_map_;
4250 root_index_map_ = nullptr;
4251
4252 delete compiler_zone_;
4253 compiler_zone_ = nullptr;
4254 compiler_cache_ = nullptr;
4255
4256 SetCodePages(nullptr);
4257
4258 ClearSerializerData();
4259
4260 if (OwnsStringTables()) {
4261 string_forwarding_table()->TearDown();
4262 } else {
4263 DCHECK_NULL(string_table_.get());
4264 DCHECK_NULL(string_forwarding_table_.get());
4265 }
4266
4267 if (!is_shared_space_isolate()) {
4268 DCHECK_NULL(shared_struct_type_registry_.get());
4269 }
4270
4271#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
4272 external_pointer_table().TearDownSpace(
4273 heap()->young_external_pointer_space());
4274 external_pointer_table().TearDownSpace(heap()->old_external_pointer_space());
4275 external_pointer_table().DetachSpaceFromReadOnlySegment(
4276 heap()->read_only_external_pointer_space());
4277 external_pointer_table().TearDownSpace(
4278 heap()->read_only_external_pointer_space());
4279 external_pointer_table().TearDown();
4280 if (owns_shareable_data()) {
4281 shared_external_pointer_table().TearDownSpace(
4282 shared_external_pointer_space());
4283 shared_external_pointer_table().TearDown();
4284 delete isolate_data_.shared_external_pointer_table_;
4285 isolate_data_.shared_external_pointer_table_ = nullptr;
4286 delete shared_external_pointer_space_;
4287 shared_external_pointer_space_ = nullptr;
4288 }
4289 cpp_heap_pointer_table().TearDownSpace(heap()->cpp_heap_pointer_space());
4290 cpp_heap_pointer_table().TearDown();
4291#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
4292
4293#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
4294 trusted_pointer_table().TearDownSpace(heap()->trusted_pointer_space());
4295 trusted_pointer_table().TearDown();
4296
4297 GetProcessWideCodePointerTable()->TearDownSpace(heap()->code_pointer_space());
4298
4299 external_buffer_table().TearDownSpace(heap()->external_buffer_space());
4300 external_buffer_table().TearDown();
4301 if (owns_shareable_data()) {
4302 shared_external_buffer_table().TearDownSpace(
4303 shared_external_buffer_space());
4304 shared_external_buffer_table().TearDown();
4305 delete isolate_data_.shared_external_buffer_table_;
4306 isolate_data_.shared_external_buffer_table_ = nullptr;
4307 delete shared_external_buffer_space_;
4308 shared_external_buffer_space_ = nullptr;
4309 }
4310#endif
4311
4312 {
4313 base::MutexGuard lock_guard(&thread_data_table_mutex_);
4314 thread_data_table_.RemoveAllThreads();
4315 }
4316}
4317
4318void Isolate::SetIsolateThreadLocals(Isolate* isolate,
4319 PerIsolateThreadData* data) {
4320 g_current_isolate_ = isolate;
4321 g_current_per_isolate_thread_data_ = data;
4322
4323#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_MULTIPLE_CAGES
4324 if (isolate) {
4325 V8HeapCompressionScheme::InitBase(isolate->cage_base());
4326#ifdef V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
4327 ExternalCodeCompressionScheme::InitBase(isolate->code_cage_base());
4328#endif // V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
4329 } else {
4330 V8HeapCompressionScheme::InitBase(kNullAddress);
4331#ifdef V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
4332 ExternalCodeCompressionScheme::InitBase(kNullAddress);
4333#endif // V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
4334 }
4335#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_MULTIPLE_CAGES
4336
4337 if (isolate && isolate->main_thread_local_isolate()) {
4338 WriteBarrier::SetForThread(
4339 isolate->main_thread_local_heap()->marking_barrier());
4340 } else {
4341 WriteBarrier::SetForThread(nullptr);
4342 }
4343}

4438void Isolate::InitializeThreadLocal() {
4439 thread_local_top()->Initialize(this);
4440#ifdef DEBUG
4441 // This method might be called on a thread that's not bound to any Isolate
4442 // and thus pointer compression schemes might have cage base value unset.
4443 // Read-only roots accessors contain type DCHECKs which require access to
4444 // V8 heap in order to check the object type. So, allow heap access here
4445 // to let the checks work.
4446 i::PtrComprCageAccessScope ptr_compr_cage_access_scope(this);
4447#endif // DEBUG
4448 clear_exception();
4449 clear_pending_message();
4450}
4451
4452void Isolate::SetTerminationOnExternalTryCatch() {
4453 DCHECK_IMPLIES(v8_flags.strict_termination_checks,
4454 is_execution_terminating());
4455 if (try_catch_handler() == nullptr) return;
4456 try_catch_handler()->can_continue_ = false;
4457 try_catch_handler()->exception_ = reinterpret_cast<void*>(
4458 ReadOnlyRoots(heap()).termination_exception().ptr());
4459}
4460
4461bool Isolate::PropagateExceptionToExternalTryCatch(
4462 ExceptionHandlerType top_handler) {
4463 Tagged<Object> exception = this->exception();
4464
4465 if (top_handler == ExceptionHandlerType::kJavaScriptHandler) return false;
4466 if (top_handler == ExceptionHandlerType::kNone) return true;
4467
4468 DCHECK_EQ(ExceptionHandlerType::kExternalTryCatch, top_handler);
4469 if (!is_catchable_by_javascript(exception)) {
4470 SetTerminationOnExternalTryCatch();
4471 } else {
4472 v8::TryCatch* handler = try_catch_handler();
4473 DCHECK(IsJSMessageObject(pending_message()) ||
4474 IsTheHole(pending_message(), this));
4475 handler->can_continue_ = true;
4476 handler->exception_ = reinterpret_cast<void*>(exception.ptr());
4477 // Propagate to the external try-catch only if we got an actual message.
4478 if (!has_pending_message()) return true;
4479 handler->message_obj_ = reinterpret_cast<void*>(pending_message().ptr());
4480 }
4481 return true;
4482}
4483
4484bool Isolate::InitializeCounters() {
4485 if (async_counters_) return false;
4486 async_counters_ = std::make_shared<Counters>(this);
4487 return true;
4488}

4492 v8_file_logger_ = new V8FileLogger(this);
4493 }
4494 InitializeCounters();
4495}

4497namespace {
4498
4499void FinalizeBuiltinCodeObjects(Isolate* isolate) {
4500 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(isolate->embedded_blob_code());
4501 DCHECK_NE(0, isolate->embedded_blob_code_size());
4502 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(isolate->embedded_blob_data());
4503 DCHECK_NE(0, isolate->embedded_blob_data_size());
4504
4505 EmbeddedData d = EmbeddedData::FromBlob(isolate);
4506 HandleScope scope(isolate);
4507 static_assert(Builtins::kAllBuiltinsAreIsolateIndependent);
4508 for (Builtin builtin = Builtins::kFirst; builtin <= Builtins::kLast;
4509 ++builtin) {
4510 Handle<Code> old_code = isolate->builtins()->code_handle(builtin);
4511 // Note that `old_code.instruction_start` might point to `old_code`'s
4512 // InstructionStream which might be GCed once we replace the old code
4513 // with the new code.
4514 Address instruction_start = d.InstructionStartOf(builtin);
4515 Handle<Code> new_code = isolate->factory()->NewCodeObjectForEmbeddedBuiltin(
4516 old_code, instruction_start);
4517
4518 // From this point onwards, the old builtin code object is unreachable and
4519 // will be collected by the next GC.
4520 isolate->builtins()->set_code(builtin, *new_code);
4521 }
4522}
4523
4524#ifdef DEBUG
4525bool IsolateIsCompatibleWithEmbeddedBlob(Isolate* isolate) {
4526 EmbeddedData d = EmbeddedData::FromBlob(isolate);
4527 return (d.IsolateHash() == isolate->HashIsolateForEmbeddedBlob());
4528}
4529#endif // DEBUG
4530
4531} // namespace
4532
4533void Isolate::InitializeDefaultEmbeddedBlob() {
4534 const uint8_t* code = DefaultEmbeddedBlobCode();
4535 uint32_t code_size = DefaultEmbeddedBlobCodeSize();
4536 const uint8_t* data = DefaultEmbeddedBlobData();
4537 uint32_t data_size = DefaultEmbeddedBlobDataSize();
4538
4539 if (StickyEmbeddedBlobCode() != nullptr) {
4540 base::MutexGuard guard(current_embedded_blob_refcount_mutex_.Pointer());
4541 // Check again now that we hold the lock.
4542 if (StickyEmbeddedBlobCode() != nullptr) {
4543 code = StickyEmbeddedBlobCode();
4544 code_size = StickyEmbeddedBlobCodeSize();
4545 data = StickyEmbeddedBlobData();
4546 data_size = StickyEmbeddedBlobDataSize();
4547 current_embedded_blob_refs_++;
4548 }
4549 }
4550
4551 if (code_size == 0) {
4552 CHECK_EQ(0, data_size);
4553 } else {
4554 SetEmbeddedBlob(code, code_size, data, data_size);
4555 }
4556}
4557
4558void Isolate::CreateAndSetEmbeddedBlob() {
4559 base::MutexGuard guard(current_embedded_blob_refcount_mutex_.Pointer());
4560
4561 PrepareBuiltinSourcePositionMap();
4562 PrepareBuiltinLabelInfoMap();
4563
4564 // If a sticky blob has been set, we reuse it.
4565 if (StickyEmbeddedBlobCode() != nullptr) {
4566 CHECK_EQ(embedded_blob_code(), StickyEmbeddedBlobCode());
4567 CHECK_EQ(embedded_blob_data(), StickyEmbeddedBlobData());
4568 CHECK_EQ(CurrentEmbeddedBlobCode(), StickyEmbeddedBlobCode());
4569 CHECK_EQ(CurrentEmbeddedBlobData(), StickyEmbeddedBlobData());
4570 } else {
4571 // Create and set a new embedded blob.
4572 uint8_t* code;
4573 uint32_t code_size;
4574 uint8_t* data;
4575 uint32_t data_size;
4576 OffHeapInstructionStream::CreateOffHeapOffHeapInstructionStream(
4577 this, &code, &code_size, &data, &data_size);
4578
4579 CHECK_EQ(0, current_embedded_blob_refs_);
4580 const uint8_t* const_code = const_cast<const uint8_t*>(code);
4581 const uint8_t* const_data = const_cast<const uint8_t*>(data);
4582 SetEmbeddedBlob(const_code, code_size, const_data, data_size);
4583 current_embedded_blob_refs_++;
4584
4585 SetStickyEmbeddedBlob(code, code_size, data, data_size);
4586 }
4587
4588 MaybeRemapEmbeddedBuiltinsIntoCodeRange();
4589 FinalizeBuiltinCodeObjects(this);
4590}
4591
4592void Isolate::InitializeIsShortBuiltinCallsEnabled() {
4593 if (V8_SHORT_BUILTIN_CALLS_BOOL && v8_flags.short_builtin_calls) {
4594#if defined(V8_OS_ANDROID)
4595 // On Android, the check is not operative to detect memory, and re-embedded
4596 // builtins don't have a memory cost.
4597 is_short_builtin_calls_enabled_ = true;
4598#else
4599 // Check if the system has more than 4GB of physical memory by comparing the
4600 // old space size with respective threshold value.
4601 is_short_builtin_calls_enabled_ = (heap_.MaxOldGenerationSize() >=
4602 kShortBuiltinCallsOldSpaceSizeThreshold);
4603#endif // defined(V8_OS_ANDROID)
4604 // Additionally, enable if there is already a process-wide CodeRange that
4605 // has re-embedded builtins.
4606 if (COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE_BOOL) {
4607 CodeRange* code_range = CodeRange::GetProcessWideCodeRange();
4608 if (code_range && code_range->embedded_blob_code_copy() != nullptr) {
4609 is_short_builtin_calls_enabled_ = true;
4610 }
4611 }
4612 if (V8_ENABLE_NEAR_CODE_RANGE_BOOL) {
4613 // The short builtin calls could still be enabled if allocated code range
4614 // is close enough to embedded builtins so that the latter could be
4615 // reached using pc-relative (short) calls/jumps.
4616 is_short_builtin_calls_enabled_ |=
4617 GetShortBuiltinsCallRegion().contains(heap_.code_region());
4618 }
4619 }
4620}
4621
4622void Isolate::MaybeRemapEmbeddedBuiltinsIntoCodeRange() {
4623 if (!is_short_builtin_calls_enabled() || !RequiresCodeRange()) {
4624 return;
4625 }
4626 if (V8_ENABLE_NEAR_CODE_RANGE_BOOL &&
4627 GetShortBuiltinsCallRegion().contains(heap_.code_region())) {
4628 // The embedded builtins are within the pc-relative reach from the code
4629 // range, so there's no need to remap embedded builtins.
4630 return;
4631 }
4632
4633 CHECK_NOT_NULL(embedded_blob_code_);
4634 CHECK_NE(embedded_blob_code_size_, 0);
4635
4636 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(heap_.code_range_);
4637 embedded_blob_code_ = heap_.code_range_->RemapEmbeddedBuiltins(
4638 this, embedded_blob_code_, embedded_blob_code_size_);
4639 CHECK_NOT_NULL(embedded_blob_code_);
4640 // The un-embedded code blob is already a part of the registered code range
4641 // so it's not necessary to register it again.
4642}
4643
4644void Isolate::TearDownEmbeddedBlob() {
4645 // Nothing to do in case the blob is embedded into the binary or unset.
4646 if (StickyEmbeddedBlobCode() == nullptr) return;
4647
4648 if (!is_short_builtin_calls_enabled()) {
4649 CHECK_EQ(embedded_blob_code(), StickyEmbeddedBlobCode());
4650 CHECK_EQ(embedded_blob_data(), StickyEmbeddedBlobData());
4651 }
4652 CHECK_EQ(CurrentEmbeddedBlobCode(), StickyEmbeddedBlobCode());
4653 CHECK_EQ(CurrentEmbeddedBlobData(), StickyEmbeddedBlobData());
4654
4655 base::MutexGuard guard(current_embedded_blob_refcount_mutex_.Pointer());
4656 current_embedded_blob_refs_--;
4657 if (current_embedded_blob_refs_ == 0 && enable_embedded_blob_refcounting_) {
4658 // We own the embedded blob and are the last holder. Free it.
4659 OffHeapInstructionStream::FreeOffHeapOffHeapInstructionStream(
4660 const_cast<uint8_t*>(CurrentEmbeddedBlobCode()),
4661 embedded_blob_code_size(),
4662 const_cast<uint8_t*>(CurrentEmbeddedBlobData()),
4663 embedded_blob_data_size());
4664 ClearEmbeddedBlob();
4665 }
4666}

4683namespace {
4684static std::string ToHexString(uintptr_t address) {
4685 std::stringstream stream_address;
4686 stream_address << "0x" << std::hex << address;
4687 return stream_address.str();
4688}

4690
4691void Isolate::AddCrashKeysForIsolateAndHeapPointers() {
4692 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(add_crash_key_callback_);
4693
4694 const uintptr_t isolate_address = reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(this);
4695 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kIsolateAddress,
4696 ToHexString(isolate_address));
4697
4698 const uintptr_t ro_space_firstpage_address =
4699 heap()->read_only_space()->FirstPageAddress();
4700 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kReadonlySpaceFirstPageAddress,
4701 ToHexString(ro_space_firstpage_address));
4702
4703 const uintptr_t old_space_firstpage_address =
4704 heap()->old_space()->FirstPageAddress();
4705 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kOldSpaceFirstPageAddress,
4706 ToHexString(old_space_firstpage_address));
4707
4708 if (heap()->code_range_base()) {
4709 const uintptr_t code_range_base_address = heap()->code_range_base();
4710 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kCodeRangeBaseAddress,
4711 ToHexString(code_range_base_address));
4712 }
4713
4714 if (heap()->code_space()->first_page()) {
4715 const uintptr_t code_space_firstpage_address =
4716 heap()->code_space()->FirstPageAddress();
4717 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kCodeSpaceFirstPageAddress,
4718 ToHexString(code_space_firstpage_address));
4719 }
4720 const v8::StartupData* data = Snapshot::DefaultSnapshotBlob();
4721 // TODO(cbruni): Implement strategy to infrequently collect this.
4722 const uint32_t v8_snapshot_checksum_calculated = 0;
4723 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kSnapshotChecksumCalculated,
4724 ToHexString(v8_snapshot_checksum_calculated));
4725 const uint32_t v8_snapshot_checksum_expected =
4726 Snapshot::GetExpectedChecksum(data);
4727 add_crash_key_callback_(v8::CrashKeyId::kSnapshotChecksumExpected,
4728 ToHexString(v8_snapshot_checksum_expected));
4729}

4769
4770void Isolate::VerifyStaticRoots() {
4771#if V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL
4772 static_assert(ReadOnlyHeap::IsReadOnlySpaceShared(),
4773 "Static read only roots are only supported when there is one "
4774 "shared read only space per cage");
4775#define STATIC_ROOTS_FAILED_MSG \
4776 "Read-only heap layout changed. Run `tools/dev/gen-static-roots.py` to " \
4777 "update static-roots.h."
4778 static_assert(static_cast<int>(RootIndex::kReadOnlyRootsCount) ==
4779 StaticReadOnlyRootsPointerTable.size(),
4780 STATIC_ROOTS_FAILED_MSG);
4781 auto& roots = roots_table();
4782 RootIndex idx = RootIndex::kFirstReadOnlyRoot;
4783 for (Tagged_t cmp_ptr : StaticReadOnlyRootsPointerTable) {
4784 Address the_root = roots[idx];
4785 Address ptr =
4786 V8HeapCompressionScheme::DecompressTagged(cage_base(), cmp_ptr);
4787 CHECK_WITH_MSG(the_root == ptr, STATIC_ROOTS_FAILED_MSG);
4788 ++idx;
4789 }
4790
4791 idx = RootIndex::kFirstReadOnlyRoot;
4792#define CHECK_NAME(_1, _2, CamelName) \
4793 CHECK_WITH_MSG(StaticReadOnlyRoot::k##CamelName == \
4794 V8HeapCompressionScheme::CompressObject(roots[idx]), \
4795 STATIC_ROOTS_FAILED_MSG); \
4796 ++idx;
4797 STRONG_READ_ONLY_ROOT_LIST(CHECK_NAME)
4798#undef CHECK_NAME
4799
4800 // Check if instance types to map range mappings are still valid.
4801 //
4802 // Is##type(map) may be computed by checking if the map pointer lies in a
4803 // statically known range of addresses, whereas Is##type(instance_type) is the
4804 // definitive source of truth. If they disagree it means that a particular
4805 // entry in InstanceTypeChecker::kUniqueMapRangeOfInstanceTypeRangeList is out
4806 // of date. This can also happen if an instance type is starting to be used by
4807 // more maps.
4808 //
4809 // If this check fails either re-arrange allocations in the read-only heap
4810 // such that the static map range is restored (consult static-roots.h for a
4811 // sorted list of addresses) or remove the offending entry from the list.
4812 for (auto idx = RootIndex::kFirstRoot; idx <= RootIndex::kLastRoot; ++idx) {
4813 Tagged<Object> obj = roots_table().slot(idx).load(this);
4814 if (obj.ptr() == kNullAddress || !IsMap(obj)) continue;
4815 Tagged<Map> map = Map::cast(obj);
4816
4817#define INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKER_SINGLE(type, _) \
4818 CHECK_EQ(InstanceTypeChecker::Is##type(map), \
4819 InstanceTypeChecker::Is##type(map->instance_type()));
4820 INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKERS_SINGLE(INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKER_SINGLE)
4821#undef INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKER_SINGLE
4822
4823#define INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKER_RANGE(type, _1, _2) \
4824 CHECK_EQ(InstanceTypeChecker::Is##type(map), \
4825 InstanceTypeChecker::Is##type(map->instance_type()));
4826 INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKERS_RANGE(INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKER_RANGE)
4827#undef INSTANCE_TYPE_CHECKER_RANGE
4828
4829 // This limit is used in various places as a fast IsJSReceiver check.
4830 CHECK_IMPLIES(
4831 InstanceTypeChecker::IsPrimitiveHeapObject(map->instance_type()),
4832 V8HeapCompressionScheme::CompressObject(map.ptr()) <
4833 InstanceTypeChecker::kNonJsReceiverMapLimit);
4834 CHECK_IMPLIES(InstanceTypeChecker::IsJSReceiver(map->instance_type()),
4835 V8HeapCompressionScheme::CompressObject(map.ptr()) >=
4836 InstanceTypeChecker::kNonJsReceiverMapLimit);
4837 CHECK(InstanceTypeChecker::kNonJsReceiverMapLimit <
4838 read_only_heap()->read_only_space()->Size());
4839
4840 if (InstanceTypeChecker::IsString(map->instance_type())) {
4841 CHECK_EQ(InstanceTypeChecker::IsString(map),
4842 InstanceTypeChecker::IsString(map->instance_type()));
4843 CHECK_EQ(InstanceTypeChecker::IsExternalString(map),
4844 InstanceTypeChecker::IsExternalString(map->instance_type()));
4845 CHECK_EQ(InstanceTypeChecker::IsInternalizedString(map),
4846 InstanceTypeChecker::IsInternalizedString(map->instance_type()));
4847 CHECK_EQ(InstanceTypeChecker::IsThinString(map),
4848 InstanceTypeChecker::IsThinString(map->instance_type()));
4849 }
4850 }
4851
4852 // Sanity check the API
4853 CHECK_EQ(
4854 v8::internal::Internals::GetRoot(reinterpret_cast<v8::Isolate*>(this),
4855 static_cast<int>(RootIndex::kNullValue)),
4856 ReadOnlyRoots(this).null_value().ptr());
4857#undef STATIC_ROOTS_FAILED_MSG
4858#endif // V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL
4859}
4860
4861bool Isolate::Init(SnapshotData* startup_snapshot_data,
4862 SnapshotData* read_only_snapshot_data,
4863 SnapshotData* shared_heap_snapshot_data, bool can_rehash) {
4864 TRACE_ISOLATE(init);
4865
4866#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE
4867 CHECK_EQ(V8HeapCompressionScheme::base(), cage_base());
4868#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_SHARED_CAGE
4869
4870 const bool create_heap_objects = (shared_heap_snapshot_data == nullptr);
4871 // We either have both or none.
4872 DCHECK_EQ(create_heap_objects, startup_snapshot_data == nullptr);
4873 DCHECK_EQ(create_heap_objects, read_only_snapshot_data == nullptr);
4874
4875 EnableRoAllocationForSnapshotScope enable_ro_allocation(this);
4876
4877 base::ElapsedTimer timer;
4878 if (create_heap_objects && v8_flags.profile_deserialization) timer.Start();
4879
4880 time_millis_at_init_ = heap_.MonotonicallyIncreasingTimeInMs();
4881
4882 Isolate* use_shared_space_isolate = nullptr;
4883
4884 if (HasFlagThatRequiresSharedHeap()) {
4885 if (process_wide_shared_space_isolate_) {
4886 owns_shareable_data_ = false;
4887 use_shared_space_isolate = process_wide_shared_space_isolate_;
4888 } else {
4889 process_wide_shared_space_isolate_ = this;
4890 use_shared_space_isolate = this;
4891 is_shared_space_isolate_ = true;
4892 DCHECK(owns_shareable_data_);
4893 }
4894 }
4895
4896 CHECK_IMPLIES(is_shared_space_isolate_, V8_CAN_CREATE_SHARED_HEAP_BOOL);
4897
4898 stress_deopt_count_ = v8_flags.deopt_every_n_times;
4899 force_slow_path_ = v8_flags.force_slow_path;
4900
4901 has_fatal_error_ = false;
4902
4903 // The initialization process does not handle memory exhaustion.
4904 AlwaysAllocateScope always_allocate(heap());
4905
4906#define ASSIGN_ELEMENT(CamelName, hacker_name) \
4907 isolate_addresses_[IsolateAddressId::k##CamelName##Address] = \
4908 reinterpret_cast<Address>(hacker_name##_address());
4909 FOR_EACH_ISOLATE_ADDRESS_NAME(ASSIGN_ELEMENT)
4910#undef ASSIGN_ELEMENT
4911
4912 // We need to initialize code_pages_ before any on-heap code is allocated to
4913 // make sure we record all code allocations.
4914 InitializeCodeRanges();
4915
4916 compilation_cache_ = new CompilationCache(this);
4917 descriptor_lookup_cache_ = new DescriptorLookupCache();
4918 global_handles_ = new GlobalHandles(this);
4919 eternal_handles_ = new EternalHandles();
4920 bootstrapper_ = new Bootstrapper(this);
4921 handle_scope_implementer_ = new HandleScopeImplementer(this);
4922 load_stub_cache_ = new StubCache(this);
4923 store_stub_cache_ = new StubCache(this);
4924 define_own_stub_cache_ = new StubCache(this);
4925 materialized_object_store_ = new MaterializedObjectStore(this);
4926 regexp_stack_ = new RegExpStack();
4927 date_cache_ = new DateCache();
4928 heap_profiler_ = new HeapProfiler(heap());
4929 interpreter_ = new interpreter::Interpreter(this);
4930 bigint_processor_ = bigint::Processor::New(new BigIntPlatform(this));
4931
4932 if (is_shared_space_isolate_) {
4933 global_safepoint_ = std::make_unique<GlobalSafepoint>(this);
4934 }
4935
4936 if (v8_flags.lazy_compile_dispatcher) {
4937 lazy_compile_dispatcher_ = std::make_unique<LazyCompileDispatcher>(
4938 this, V8::GetCurrentPlatform(), v8_flags.stack_size);
4939 }
4940#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SPARKPLUG
4941 baseline_batch_compiler_ = new baseline::BaselineBatchCompiler(this);
4942#endif // V8_ENABLE_SPARKPLUG
4943#ifdef V8_ENABLE_MAGLEV
4944 maglev_concurrent_dispatcher_ = new maglev::MaglevConcurrentDispatcher(this);
4945#endif // V8_ENABLE_MAGLEV
4946
4947#if USE_SIMULATOR
4948 simulator_data_ = new SimulatorData;
4949#endif
4950
4951 // Enable logging before setting up the heap
4952 v8_file_logger_->SetUp(this);
4953
4954 metrics_recorder_ = std::make_shared<metrics::Recorder>();
4955
4956 {
4957 // Ensure that the thread has a valid stack guard. The v8::Locker object
4958 // will ensure this too, but we don't have to use lockers if we are only
4959 // using one thread.
4960 ExecutionAccess lock(this);
4961 stack_guard()->InitThread(lock);
4962 }
4963
4964 // Create LocalIsolate/LocalHeap for the main thread and set state to Running.
4965 main_thread_local_isolate_.reset(new LocalIsolate(this, ThreadKind::kMain));
4966
4967 {
4968 IgnoreLocalGCRequests ignore_gc_requests(heap());
4969 main_thread_local_heap()->Unpark();
4970 }
4971
4972 // Requires a LocalHeap to be set up to register a GC epilogue callback.
4973 inner_pointer_to_code_cache_ = new InnerPointerToCodeCache(this);
4974
4975#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
4976 wasm_code_look_up_cache_ = new wasm::WasmCodeLookupCache;
4977#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
4978
4979 // Lock clients_mutex_ in order to prevent shared GCs from other clients
4980 // during deserialization.
4981 base::Optional<base::RecursiveMutexGuard> clients_guard;
4982
4983 if (use_shared_space_isolate && !is_shared_space_isolate()) {
4984 clients_guard.emplace(
4985 &use_shared_space_isolate->global_safepoint()->clients_mutex_);
4986 use_shared_space_isolate->global_safepoint()->AppendClient(this);
4987 }
4988
4989 shared_space_isolate_ = use_shared_space_isolate;
4990
4991 isolate_data_.is_shared_space_isolate_flag_ = is_shared_space_isolate();
4992 isolate_data_.uses_shared_heap_flag_ = has_shared_space();
4993
4994 if (use_shared_space_isolate && !is_shared_space_isolate() &&
4995 use_shared_space_isolate->heap()
4996 ->incremental_marking()
4997 ->IsMajorMarking()) {
4998 heap_.SetIsMarkingFlag(true);
4999 }
5000
5001 // Set up the object heap.
5002 DCHECK(!heap_.HasBeenSetUp());
5003 heap_.SetUp(main_thread_local_heap());
5004 InitializeIsShortBuiltinCallsEnabled();
5005 if (!create_heap_objects) {
5006 // Must be done before deserializing RO space, since RO space may contain
5007 // builtin Code objects which point into the (potentially remapped)
5008 // embedded blob.
5009 MaybeRemapEmbeddedBuiltinsIntoCodeRange();
5010 }
5011 {
5012 // Must be done before deserializing RO space since the deserialization
5013 // process refers to these data structures.
5014 isolate_data_.external_reference_table()->InitIsolateIndependent();
5015#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
5016 external_pointer_table().Initialize();
5017 external_pointer_table().InitializeSpace(
5018 heap()->read_only_external_pointer_space());
5019 external_pointer_table().AttachSpaceToReadOnlySegment(
5020 heap()->read_only_external_pointer_space());
5021 external_pointer_table().InitializeSpace(
5022 heap()->young_external_pointer_space());
5023 external_pointer_table().InitializeSpace(
5024 heap()->old_external_pointer_space());
5025 cpp_heap_pointer_table().Initialize();
5026 cpp_heap_pointer_table().InitializeSpace(heap()->cpp_heap_pointer_space());
5027#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
5028
5029#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
5030 trusted_pointer_table().Initialize();
5031 trusted_pointer_table().InitializeSpace(heap()->trusted_pointer_space());
5032 external_buffer_table().Initialize();
5033 external_buffer_table().InitializeSpace(heap()->external_buffer_space());
5034#endif // V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
5035 }
5036 ReadOnlyHeap::SetUp(this, read_only_snapshot_data, can_rehash);
5037 heap_.SetUpSpaces(isolate_data_.new_allocation_info_,
5038 isolate_data_.old_allocation_info_);
5039
5040 DCHECK_EQ(this, Isolate::Current());
5041 PerIsolateThreadData* const current_data = CurrentPerIsolateThreadData();
5042 DCHECK_EQ(current_data->isolate(), this);
5043 SetIsolateThreadLocals(this, current_data);
5044
5045 if (OwnsStringTables()) {
5046 string_table_ = std::make_unique<StringTable>(this);
5047 string_forwarding_table_ = std::make_unique<StringForwardingTable>(this);
5048 } else {
5049 // Only refer to shared string table after attaching to the shared isolate.
5050 DCHECK(has_shared_space());
5051 DCHECK(!is_shared_space_isolate());
5052 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(string_table());
5053 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(string_forwarding_table());
5054 }
5055
5056#ifdef V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
5057 {
5058 VirtualMemoryCage* code_cage;
5059 if (heap_.code_range()) {
5060 code_cage = heap_.code_range();
5061 } else {
5062 CHECK(jitless_);
5063 // In jitless mode the code space pages will be allocated in the main
5064 // pointer compression cage.
5065 code_cage = isolate_group_->GetPtrComprCage();
5066 }
5067 code_cage_base_ = ExternalCodeCompressionScheme::PrepareCageBaseAddress(
5068 code_cage->base());
5069 if (COMPRESS_POINTERS_IN_MULTIPLE_CAGES_BOOL) {
5070 // .. now that it's available, initialize the thread-local base.
5071 ExternalCodeCompressionScheme::InitBase(code_cage_base_);
5072 }
5073 CHECK_EQ(ExternalCodeCompressionScheme::base(), code_cage_base_);
5074
5075 // Ensure that ExternalCodeCompressionScheme is applicable to all objects
5076 // stored in the code cage.
5077 using ComprScheme = ExternalCodeCompressionScheme;
5078 Address base = code_cage->base();
5079 Address last = base + code_cage->size() - 1;
5080 PtrComprCageBase code_cage_base{code_cage_base_};
5081 CHECK_EQ(base, ComprScheme::DecompressTagged(
5082 code_cage_base, ComprScheme::CompressObject(base)));
5083 CHECK_EQ(last, ComprScheme::DecompressTagged(
5084 code_cage_base, ComprScheme::CompressObject(last)));
5085 }
5086#endif // V8_EXTERNAL_CODE_SPACE
5087
5088 isolate_data_.external_reference_table()->Init(this);
5089
5090#ifdef V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
5091 if (owns_shareable_data()) {
5092 isolate_data_.shared_external_pointer_table_ = new ExternalPointerTable();
5093 shared_external_pointer_space_ = new ExternalPointerTable::Space();
5094 shared_external_pointer_table().Initialize();
5095 shared_external_pointer_table().InitializeSpace(
5096 shared_external_pointer_space());
5097 } else {
5098 DCHECK(has_shared_space());
5099 isolate_data_.shared_external_pointer_table_ =
5100 shared_space_isolate()->isolate_data_.shared_external_pointer_table_;
5101 shared_external_pointer_space_ =
5102 shared_space_isolate()->shared_external_pointer_space_;
5103 }
5104#endif // V8_COMPRESS_POINTERS
5105
5106#ifdef V8_ENABLE_SANDBOX
5107 GetProcessWideCodePointerTable()->InitializeSpace(
5108 heap()->code_pointer_space());
5109 if (owns_shareable_data()) {
5110 isolate_data_.shared_external_buffer_table_ = new ExternalBufferTable();
5111 shared_external_buffer_space_ = new ExternalBufferTable::Space();
5112 shared_external_buffer_table().Initialize();
5113 shared_external_buffer_table().InitializeSpace(
5114 shared_external_buffer_space());
5115 } else {
5116 DCHECK(has_shared_space());
5117 isolate_data_.shared_external_buffer_table_ =
5118 shared_space_isolate()->isolate_data_.shared_external_buffer_table_;
5119 shared_external_buffer_space_ =
5120 shared_space_isolate()->shared_external_buffer_space_;
5121 }
5122#endif
5123
5124#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5125 wasm::GetWasmEngine()->AddIsolate(this);
5126#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5127
5128#if defined(V8_OS_WIN) && defined(V8_ENABLE_ETW_STACK_WALKING)
5129 if (v8_flags.enable_etw_stack_walking) {
5130 ETWJITInterface::AddIsolate(this);
5131 }
5132#endif // defined(V8_OS_WIN)
5133
5134 if (setup_delegate_ == nullptr) {
5135 setup_delegate_ = new SetupIsolateDelegate;
5136 }
5137
5138 if (!v8_flags.inline_new) heap_.DisableInlineAllocation();
5139
5140 if (!setup_delegate_->SetupHeap(this, create_heap_objects)) {
5141 V8::FatalProcessOutOfMemory(this, "heap object creation");
5142 }
5143
5144 if (create_heap_objects) {
5145 // Terminate the startup and shared heap object caches so we can iterate.
5146 startup_object_cache_.push_back(ReadOnlyRoots(this).undefined_value());
5147 shared_heap_object_cache_.push_back(ReadOnlyRoots(this).undefined_value());
5148 }
5149
5150 InitializeThreadLocal();
5151
5152 // Profiler has to be created after ThreadLocal is initialized
5153 // because it makes use of interrupts.
5154 tracing_cpu_profiler_.reset(new TracingCpuProfilerImpl(this));
5155
5156 bootstrapper_->Initialize(create_heap_objects);
5157
5158 if (create_heap_objects) {
5159 builtins_constants_table_builder_ = new BuiltinsConstantsTableBuilder(this);
5160
5161 setup_delegate_->SetupBuiltins(this, true);
5162
5163 builtins_constants_table_builder_->Finalize();
5164 delete builtins_constants_table_builder_;
5165 builtins_constants_table_builder_ = nullptr;
5166
5167 CreateAndSetEmbeddedBlob();
5168 } else {
5169 setup_delegate_->SetupBuiltins(this, false);
5170 }
5171
5172 // Initialize custom memcopy and memmove functions (must happen after
5173 // embedded blob setup).
5174 init_memcopy_functions();
5175
5176 if (v8_flags.trace_turbo || v8_flags.trace_turbo_graph ||
5177 v8_flags.turbo_profiling) {
5178 PrintF("Concurrent recompilation has been disabled for tracing.\n");
5179 } else if (OptimizingCompileDispatcher::Enabled()) {
5180 optimizing_compile_dispatcher_ = new OptimizingCompileDispatcher(this);
5181 }
5182
5183 // Initialize before deserialization since collections may occur,
5184 // clearing/updating ICs (and thus affecting tiering decisions).
5185 tiering_manager_ = new TieringManager(this);
5186
5187 if (!create_heap_objects) {
5188 // If we are deserializing, read the state into the now-empty heap.
5189 SharedHeapDeserializer shared_heap_deserializer(
5190 this, shared_heap_snapshot_data, can_rehash);
5191 shared_heap_deserializer.DeserializeIntoIsolate();
5192
5193 StartupDeserializer startup_deserializer(this, startup_snapshot_data,
5194 can_rehash);
5195 startup_deserializer.DeserializeIntoIsolate();
5196 }
5197 if (DEBUG_BOOL) VerifyStaticRoots();
5198 load_stub_cache_->Initialize();
5199 store_stub_cache_->Initialize();
5200 define_own_stub_cache_->Initialize();
5201 interpreter_->Initialize();
5202 heap_.NotifyDeserializationComplete();
5203
5204 delete setup_delegate_;
5205 setup_delegate_ = nullptr;
5206
5207 Builtins::InitializeIsolateDataTables(this);
5208
5209 // Extra steps in the logger after the heap has been set up.
5210 v8_file_logger_->LateSetup(this);
5211
5212#ifdef DEBUG
5213 // Verify that the current heap state (usually deserialized from the snapshot)
5214 // is compatible with the embedded blob. If this DCHECK fails, we've likely
5215 // loaded a snapshot generated by a different V8 version or build-time
5216 // configuration.
5217 if (!IsolateIsCompatibleWithEmbeddedBlob(this)) {
5218 FATAL(
5219 "The Isolate is incompatible with the embedded blob. This is usually "
5220 "caused by incorrect usage of mksnapshot. When generating custom "
5221 "snapshots, embedders must ensure they pass the same flags as during "
5222 "the V8 build process (e.g.: --turbo-instruction-scheduling).");
5223 }
5224#endif // DEBUG
5225
5226 if (v8_flags.print_builtin_code) builtins()->PrintBuiltinCode();
5227 if (v8_flags.print_builtin_size) builtins()->PrintBuiltinSize();
5228
5229 // Finish initialization of ThreadLocal after deserialization is done.
5230 clear_exception();
5231 clear_pending_message();
5232
5233 // Quiet the heap NaN if needed on target platform.
5234 if (!create_heap_objects)
5235 Assembler::QuietNaN(ReadOnlyRoots(this).nan_value());
5236
5237 if (v8_flags.trace_turbo) {
5238 // Create an empty file.
5239 std::ofstream(GetTurboCfgFileName(this).c_str(), std::ios_base::trunc);
5240 }
5241
5242 isolate_data_.continuation_preserved_embedder_data_ =
5243 *factory()->undefined_value();
5244
5245 {
5246 HandleScope scope(this);
5247 ast_string_constants_ = new AstStringConstants(this, HashSeed(this));
5248 }
5249
5250 initialized_from_snapshot_ = !create_heap_objects;
5251
5252 if (v8_flags.stress_sampling_allocation_profiler > 0) {
5253 uint64_t sample_interval = v8_flags.stress_sampling_allocation_profiler;
5254 int stack_depth = 128;
5255 v8::HeapProfiler::SamplingFlags sampling_flags =
5256 v8::HeapProfiler::SamplingFlags::kSamplingForceGC;
5257 heap_profiler()->StartSamplingHeapProfiler(sample_interval, stack_depth,
5258 sampling_flags);
5259 }
5260
5261 if (create_heap_objects && v8_flags.profile_deserialization) {
5262 double ms = timer.Elapsed().InMillisecondsF();
5263 PrintF("[Initializing isolate from scratch took %0.3f ms]\n", ms);
5264 }
5265
5266 if (initialized_from_snapshot_) {
5267 SLOW_DCHECK(SharedFunctionInfo::UniqueIdsAreUnique(this));
5268 }
5269
5270 if (v8_flags.harmony_struct) {
5271 // Initialize or get the struct type registry shared by all isolates.
5272 if (is_shared_space_isolate()) {
5273 shared_struct_type_registry_ =
5274 std::make_unique<SharedStructTypeRegistry>();
5275 } else {
5276 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(shared_struct_type_registry());
5277 }
5278 }
5279
5280#ifdef V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5281#if V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL
5282 // Protect the payload of wasm null.
5283 if (!page_allocator()->DecommitPages(
5284 reinterpret_cast<void*>(factory()->wasm_null()->payload()),
5285 WasmNull::kSize - kTaggedSize)) {
5286 V8::FatalProcessOutOfMemory(this, "decommitting WasmNull payload");
5287 }
5288#endif // V8_STATIC_ROOTS_BOOL
5289#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5290
5291 // Isolate initialization allocates long living objects that should be
5292 // pretenured to old space.
5293 DCHECK_IMPLIES(heap()->new_space(), heap()->new_space()->Size() == 0);
5294 DCHECK_IMPLIES(heap()->new_lo_space(), heap()->new_lo_space()->Size() == 0);
5295 DCHECK_EQ(heap()->gc_count(), 0);
5296
5297#if defined(V8_OS_WIN) && defined(V8_ENABLE_ETW_STACK_WALKING)
5298 if (v8_flags.enable_etw_stack_walking) {
5299 ETWJITInterface::MaybeSetHandlerNow(this);
5300 }
5301#endif // defined(V8_OS_WIN) && defined(V8_ENABLE_ETW_STACK_WALKING)
5302
5303#if defined(V8_USE_PERFETTO)
5304 PerfettoLogger::RegisterIsolate(this);
5305#endif // defined(V8_USE_PERFETTO)
5306
5307 initialized_ = true;
5308
5309 return true;
5310}
5311
5312void Isolate::Enter() {
5313 Isolate* current_isolate = nullptr;
5314 PerIsolateThreadData* current_data = CurrentPerIsolateThreadData();
5315
5316#ifdef V8_ENABLE_CHECKS
5317 // No different thread must have entered the isolate. Allow re-entering.
5318 ThreadId thread_id = ThreadId::Current();
5319 if (current_thread_id_.IsValid()) {
5320 CHECK_EQ(current_thread_id_, thread_id);
5321 } else {
5322 CHECK_EQ(0, current_thread_counter_);
5323 current_thread_id_ = thread_id;
5324 }
5325 current_thread_counter_++;
5326#endif
5327
5328 // Set the stack start for the main thread that enters the isolate.
5329 heap()->SetStackStart();
5330
5331 if (current_data != nullptr) {
5332 current_isolate = current_data->isolate_;
5333 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(current_isolate);
5334 if (current_isolate == this) {
5335 DCHECK(Current() == this);
5336 auto entry_stack = entry_stack_.load();
5337 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(entry_stack);
5338 DCHECK(entry_stack->previous_thread_data == nullptr ||
5339 entry_stack->previous_thread_data->thread_id() ==
5340 ThreadId::Current());
5341 // Same thread re-enters the isolate, no need to re-init anything.
5342 entry_stack->entry_count++;
5343 return;
5344 }
5345 }
5346
5347 PerIsolateThreadData* data = FindOrAllocatePerThreadDataForThisThread();
5348 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(data);
5349 DCHECK(data->isolate_ == this);
5350
5351 EntryStackItem* item =
5352 new EntryStackItem(current_data, current_isolate, entry_stack_);
5353 entry_stack_ = item;
5354
5355 SetIsolateThreadLocals(this, data);
5356
5357 // In case it's the first time some thread enters the isolate.
5358 set_thread_id(data->thread_id());
5359}
5360
5361void Isolate::Exit() {
5362 auto current_entry_stack = entry_stack_.load();
5363 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(current_entry_stack);
5364 DCHECK(current_entry_stack->previous_thread_data == nullptr ||
5365 current_entry_stack->previous_thread_data->thread_id() ==
5366 ThreadId::Current());
5367
5368#ifdef V8_ENABLE_CHECKS
5369 // The current thread must have entered the isolate.
5370 CHECK_EQ(current_thread_id_, ThreadId::Current());
5371 if (--current_thread_counter_ == 0) current_thread_id_ = ThreadId::Invalid();
5372#endif
5373
5374 if (--current_entry_stack->entry_count > 0) return;
5375
5376 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(CurrentPerIsolateThreadData());
5377 DCHECK(CurrentPerIsolateThreadData()->isolate_ == this);
5378
5379 // Pop the stack.
5380 entry_stack_ = current_entry_stack->previous_item;
5381
5382 PerIsolateThreadData* previous_thread_data =
5383 current_entry_stack->previous_thread_data;
5384 Isolate* previous_isolate = current_entry_stack->previous_isolate;
5385
5386 delete current_entry_stack;
5387
5388 // Reinit the current thread for the isolate it was running before this one.
5389 SetIsolateThreadLocals(previous_isolate, previous_thread_data);
5390}
5391
5392std::unique_ptr<PersistentHandles> Isolate::NewPersistentHandles() {
5393 return std::make_unique<PersistentHandles>(this);
5394}
5395
5396void Isolate::DumpAndResetStats() {
5397 if (v8_flags.trace_turbo_stack_accesses) {
5398 StdoutStream os;
5399 uint64_t total_loads = 0;
5400 uint64_t total_stores = 0;
5401 os << "=== Stack access counters === " << std::endl;
5402 if (!stack_access_count_map) {
5403 os << "No stack accesses in optimized/wasm functions found.";
5404 } else {
5405 DCHECK_NOT_NULL(stack_access_count_map);
5406 os << "Number of optimized/wasm stack-access functions: "
5407 << stack_access_count_map->size() << std::endl;
5408 for (auto it = stack_access_count_map->cbegin();
5409 it != stack_access_count_map->cend(); it++) {
5410 std::string function_name((*it).first);
5411 std::pair<uint64_t, uint64_t> per_func_count = (*it).second;
5412 os << "Name: " << function_name << ", Loads: " << per_func_count.first
5413 << ", Stores: " << per_func_count.second << std::endl;
5414 total_loads += per_func_count.first;
5415 total_stores += per_func_count.second;
5416 }
5417 os << "Total Loads: " << total_loads << ", Total Stores: " << total_stores
5418 << std::endl;
5419 stack_access_count_map = nullptr;
5420 }
5421 }
5422 if (turbo_statistics_ != nullptr) {
5423 DCHECK(v8_flags.turbo_stats || v8_flags.turbo_stats_nvp);
5424 StdoutStream os;
5425 if (v8_flags.turbo_stats) {
5426 AsPrintableStatistics ps = {"Turbofan", *turbo_statistics_, false};
5427 os << ps << std::endl;
5428 }
5429 if (v8_flags.turbo_stats_nvp) {
5430 AsPrintableStatistics ps = {"Turbofan", *turbo_statistics_, true};
5431 os << ps << std::endl;
5432 }
5433 turbo_statistics_.reset();
5434 }
5435
5436#ifdef V8_ENABLE_MAGLEV
5437 if (maglev_statistics_ != nullptr) {
5438 DCHECK(v8_flags.maglev_stats || v8_flags.maglev_stats_nvp);
5439 StdoutStream os;
5440 if (v8_flags.maglev_stats) {
5441 AsPrintableStatistics ps = {"Maglev", *maglev_statistics_, false};
5442 os << ps << std::endl;
5443 }
5444 if (v8_flags.maglev_stats_nvp) {
5445 AsPrintableStatistics ps = {"Maglev", *maglev_statistics_, true};
5446 os << ps << std::endl;
5447 }
5448 maglev_statistics_.reset();
5449 }
5450#endif // V8_ENABLE_MAGLEV
5451
5452#if V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5453 // TODO(7424): There is no public API for the {WasmEngine} yet. So for now we
5454 // just dump and reset the engines statistics together with the Isolate.
5455 if (v8_flags.turbo_stats_wasm) {
5456 wasm::GetWasmEngine()->DumpAndResetTurboStatistics();
5457 }
5458#endif // V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5459#if V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS
5460 if (V8_UNLIKELY(TracingFlags::runtime_stats.load(std::memory_order_relaxed) ==
5461 v8::tracing::TracingCategoryObserver::ENABLED_BY_NATIVE)) {
5462 counters()->worker_thread_runtime_call_stats()->AddToMainTable(
5463 counters()->runtime_call_stats());
5464 counters()->runtime_call_stats()->Print();
5465 counters()->runtime_call_stats()->Reset();
5466 }
5467#endif // V8_RUNTIME_CALL_STATS
5468 if (BasicBlockProfiler::Get()->HasData(this)) {
5469 if (v8_flags.turbo_profiling_output) {
5470 FILE* f = std::fopen(v8_flags.turbo_profiling_output, "w");
5471 if (f == nullptr) {
5472 FATAL("Unable to open file \"%s\" for writing.\n",
5473 v8_flags.turbo_profiling_output.value());
5474 }
5475 OFStream pgo_stream(f);
5476 BasicBlockProfiler::Get()->Log(this, pgo_stream);
5477 } else {
5478 StdoutStream out;
5479 BasicBlockProfiler::Get()->Print(this, out);
5480 }
5481 BasicBlockProfiler::Get()->ResetCounts(this);
5482 } else {
5483 // Only log builtins PGO data if v8 was built with
5484 // v8_enable_builtins_profiling=true
5485 CHECK_NULL(v8_flags.turbo_profiling_output);
5486 }
5487}

5505#endif
5506}

5556
5557bool Isolate::NeedsSourcePositions() const {
5558 return
5559 // Static conditions.
5560 v8_flags.trace_deopt || v8_flags.trace_turbo ||
5561 v8_flags.trace_turbo_graph || v8_flags.turbo_profiling ||
5562 v8_flags.print_maglev_code || v8_flags.perf_prof || v8_flags.log_maps ||
5563 v8_flags.log_ic || v8_flags.log_function_events ||
5564 v8_flags.heap_snapshot_on_oom ||
5565 // Dynamic conditions; changing any of these conditions triggers source
5566 // position collection for the entire heap
5567 // (CollectSourcePositionsForAllBytecodeArrays).
5568 is_profiling() || debug_->is_active() || v8_file_logger_->is_logging();
5569}
5570
5571void Isolate::SetFeedbackVectorsForProfilingTools(Tagged<Object> value) {
5572 DCHECK(IsUndefined(value, this) || IsArrayList(value));
5573 heap()->set_feedback_vectors_for_profiling_tools(value);
5574}
5575
5576void Isolate::MaybeInitializeVectorListFromHeap() {
5577 if (!IsUndefined(heap()->feedback_vectors_for_profiling_tools(), this)) {
5578 // Already initialized, return early.
5579 DCHECK(IsArrayList(heap()->feedback_vectors_for_profiling_tools()));
5580 return;
5581 }
5582
5583 // Collect existing feedback vectors.
5584 std::vector<Handle<FeedbackVector>> vectors;
5585
5586 {
5587 HeapObjectIterator heap_iterator(heap());
5588 for (Tagged<HeapObject> current_obj = heap_iterator.Next();
5589 !current_obj.is_null(); current_obj = heap_iterator.Next()) {
5590 if (!IsFeedbackVector(current_obj)) continue;
5591
5592 Tagged<FeedbackVector> vector = FeedbackVector::cast(current_obj);
5593 Tagged<SharedFunctionInfo> shared = vector->shared_function_info();
5594
5595 // No need to preserve the feedback vector for non-user-visible functions.
5596 if (!shared->IsSubjectToDebugging()) continue;
5597
5598 vectors.emplace_back(vector, this);
5599 }
5600 }
5601
5602 // Add collected feedback vectors to the root list lest we lose them to GC.
5603 Handle<ArrayList> list =
5604 ArrayList::New(this, static_cast<int>(vectors.size()));
5605 for (const auto& vector : vectors) list = ArrayList::Add(this, list, vector);
5606 SetFeedbackVectorsForProfilingTools(*list);
5607}

5609void Isolate::set_date_cache(DateCache* date_cache) {
5610 if (date_cache != date_cache_) {
5611 delete date_cache_;
5612 }
5613 date_cache_ = date_cache;
5614}
5615
5616Isolate::KnownPrototype Isolate::IsArrayOrObjectOrStringPrototype(
5617 Tagged<Object> object) {
5618 Tagged<Object> context = heap()->native_contexts_list();
5619 while (!IsUndefined(context, this)) {
5620 Tagged<Context> current_context = Context::cast(context);
5621 if (current_context->initial_object_prototype() == object) {
5622 return KnownPrototype::kObject;
5623 } else if (current_context->initial_array_prototype() == object) {
5624 return KnownPrototype::kArray;
5625 } else if (current_context->initial_string_prototype() == object) {
5626 return KnownPrototype::kString;
5627 }
5628 context = current_context->next_context_link();
5629 }
5630 return KnownPrototype::kNone;
5631}
5632
5633bool Isolate::IsInAnyContext(Tagged<Object> object, uint32_t index) {
5634 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
5635 Tagged<Object> context = heap()->native_contexts_list();
5636 while (!IsUndefined(context, this)) {
5637 Tagged<Context> current_context = Context::cast(context);
5638 if (current_context->get(index) == object) {
5639 return true;
5640 }
5641 context = current_context->next_context_link();
5642 }
5643 return false;
5644}
5645
5646void Isolate::UpdateNoElementsProtectorOnSetElement(Handle<JSObject> object) {
5647 DisallowGarbageCollection no_gc;
5648 if (!object->map()->is_prototype_map()) return;
5649 if (!Protectors::IsNoElementsIntact(this)) return;
5650 KnownPrototype obj_type = IsArrayOrObjectOrStringPrototype(*object);
5651 if (obj_type == KnownPrototype::kNone) return;
5652 if (obj_type == KnownPrototype::kObject) {
5653 this->CountUsage(v8::Isolate::kObjectPrototypeHasElements);
5654 } else if (obj_type == KnownPrototype::kArray) {
5655 this->CountUsage(v8::Isolate::kArrayPrototypeHasElements);
5656 }
5657 Protectors::InvalidateNoElements(this);
5658}
5659
5660void Isolate::UpdateProtectorsOnSetPrototype(Handle<JSObject> object,
5661 Handle<Object> new_prototype) {
5662 UpdateNoElementsProtectorOnSetPrototype(object);
5663 UpdateTypedArraySpeciesLookupChainProtectorOnSetPrototype(object);
5664 UpdateNumberStringNotRegexpLikeProtectorOnSetPrototype(object);
5665 UpdateStringWrapperToPrimitiveProtectorOnSetPrototype(object, new_prototype);
5666}
5667
5668void Isolate::UpdateTypedArraySpeciesLookupChainProtectorOnSetPrototype(
5669 Handle<JSObject> object) {
5670 // Setting the __proto__ of TypedArray constructor could change TypedArray's
5671 // @@species. So we need to invalidate the @@species protector.
5672 if (IsTypedArrayConstructor(*object) &&
5673 Protectors::IsTypedArraySpeciesLookupChainIntact(this)) {
5674 Protectors::InvalidateTypedArraySpeciesLookupChain(this);
5675 }
5676}
5677
5678void Isolate::UpdateNumberStringNotRegexpLikeProtectorOnSetPrototype(
5679 Handle<JSObject> object) {
5680 if (!Protectors::IsNumberStringNotRegexpLikeIntact(this)) {
5681 return;
5682 }
5683 // We need to protect the prototype chain of `Number.prototype` and
5684 // `String.prototype`.
5685 // Since `Object.prototype.__proto__` is not writable, we can assume it
5686 // doesn't occur here. We detect `Number.prototype` and `String.prototype` by
5687 // checking for a prototype that is a JSPrimitiveWrapper. This is a safe
5688 // approximation. Using JSPrimitiveWrapper as prototype should be
5689 // sufficiently rare.
5690 DCHECK(!IsJSObjectPrototype(*object));
5691 if (object->map()->is_prototype_map() && (IsJSPrimitiveWrapper(*object))) {
5692 Protectors::InvalidateNumberStringNotRegexpLike(this);
5693 }
5694}
5695
5696void Isolate::UpdateStringWrapperToPrimitiveProtectorOnSetPrototype(
5697 Handle<JSObject> object, Handle<Object> new_prototype) {
5698 if (!Protectors::IsStringWrapperToPrimitiveIntact(this)) {
5699 return;
5700 }
5701
5702 // We can have a custom @@toPrimitive on a string wrapper also if we subclass
5703 // String and the subclass (or one of its subclasses) defines its own
5704 // @@toPrimive. Thus we invalidate the protector whenever we detect
5705 // subclassing String - it should be reasonably rare.
5706 if (IsStringWrapper(*object) || IsStringWrapper(*new_prototype)) {
5707 Protectors::InvalidateStringWrapperToPrimitive(this);
5708 }
5709}
5710
5711static base::RandomNumberGenerator* ensure_rng_exists(
5712 base::RandomNumberGenerator** rng, int seed) {
5713 if (*rng == nullptr) {
5714 if (seed != 0) {
5715 *rng = new base::RandomNumberGenerator(seed);
5716 } else {
5717 *rng = new base::RandomNumberGenerator();
5718 }
5719 }
5720 return *rng;
5721}
5722
5723base::RandomNumberGenerator* Isolate::random_number_generator() {
5724 // TODO(bmeurer) Initialized lazily because it depends on flags; can
5725 // be fixed once the default isolate cleanup is done.
5726 return ensure_rng_exists(&random_number_generator_, v8_flags.random_seed);
5727}
5728
5729base::RandomNumberGenerator* Isolate::fuzzer_rng() {
5730 if (fuzzer_rng_ == nullptr) {
5731 int64_t seed = v8_flags.fuzzer_random_seed;
5732 if (seed == 0) {
5733 seed = random_number_generator()->initial_seed();
5734 }
5735
5736 fuzzer_rng_ = new base::RandomNumberGenerator(seed);
5737 }
5738
5739 return fuzzer_rng_;
5740}
5741
5742int Isolate::GenerateIdentityHash(uint32_t mask) {
5743 int hash;
5744 int attempts = 0;
5745 do {
5746 hash = random_number_generator()->NextInt() & mask;
5747 } while (hash == 0 && attempts++ < 30);
5748 return hash != 0 ? hash : 1;
5749}

5753 const intptr_t Isolate::name##_debug_offset_ = OFFSET_OF(Isolate, name##_);
5754ISOLATE_INIT_LIST(ISOLATE_FIELD_OFFSET)
5755ISOLATE_INIT_ARRAY_LIST(ISOLATE_FIELD_OFFSET)
5756#undef ISOLATE_FIELD_OFFSET
5757#endif
5758
5759Handle<Symbol> Isolate::SymbolFor(RootIndex dictionary_index,
5760 Handle<String> name, bool private_symbol) {
5761 Handle<String> key = factory()->InternalizeString(name);
5762 Handle<RegisteredSymbolTable> dictionary =
5763 Handle<RegisteredSymbolTable>::cast(root_handle(dictionary_index));
5764 InternalIndex entry = dictionary->FindEntry(this, key);
5765 Handle<Symbol> symbol;
5766 if (entry.is_not_found()) {
5767 symbol =
5768 private_symbol ? factory()->NewPrivateSymbol() : factory()->NewSymbol();
5769 symbol->set_description(*key);
5770 dictionary = RegisteredSymbolTable::Add(this, dictionary, key, symbol);
5771
5772 switch (dictionary_index) {
5773 case RootIndex::kPublicSymbolTable:
5774 symbol->set_is_in_public_symbol_table(true);
5775 heap()->set_public_symbol_table(*dictionary);
5776 break;
5777 case RootIndex::kApiSymbolTable:
5778 heap()->set_api_symbol_table(*dictionary);
5779 break;
5780 case RootIndex::kApiPrivateSymbolTable:
5781 heap()->set_api_private_symbol_table(*dictionary);
5782 break;
5783 default:
5784 UNREACHABLE();
5785 }
5786 } else {
5787 symbol = Handle<Symbol>(Symbol::cast(dictionary->ValueAt(entry)), this);
5788 }
5789 return symbol;
5790}
5791
5792void Isolate::AddBeforeCallEnteredCallback(BeforeCallEnteredCallback callback) {
5793 auto pos = std::find(before_call_entered_callbacks_.begin(),
5794 before_call_entered_callbacks_.end(), callback);
5795 if (pos != before_call_entered_callbacks_.end()) return;
5796 before_call_entered_callbacks_.push_back(callback);
5797}
5798
5799void Isolate::RemoveBeforeCallEnteredCallback(
5800 BeforeCallEnteredCallback callback) {
5801 auto pos = std::find(before_call_entered_callbacks_.begin(),
5802 before_call_entered_callbacks_.end(), callback);
5803 if (pos == before_call_entered_callbacks_.end()) return;
5804 before_call_entered_callbacks_.erase(pos);
5805}
5806
5807void Isolate::AddCallCompletedCallback(CallCompletedCallback callback) {
5808 auto pos = std::find(call_completed_callbacks_.begin(),
5809 call_completed_callbacks_.end(), callback);
5810 if (pos != call_completed_callbacks_.end()) return;
5811 call_completed_callbacks_.push_back(callback);
5812}
5813
5814void Isolate::RemoveCallCompletedCallback(CallCompletedCallback callback) {
5815 auto pos = std::find(call_completed_callbacks_.begin(),
5816 call_completed_callbacks_.end(), callback);
5817 if (pos == call_completed_callbacks_.end()) return;
5818 call_completed_callbacks_.erase(pos);
5819}
5820
5821void Isolate::FireCallCompletedCallbackInternal(
5822 MicrotaskQueue* microtask_queue) {
5823 DCHECK(thread_local_top()->CallDepthIsZero());
5824
5825 bool perform_checkpoint =
5826 microtask_queue &&
5827 microtask_queue->microtasks_policy() == v8::MicrotasksPolicy::kAuto &&
5828 !is_execution_terminating();
5829
5830 v8::Isolate* isolate = reinterpret_cast<v8::Isolate*>(this);
5831 if (perform_checkpoint) microtask_queue->PerformCheckpoint(isolate);
5832
5833 if (call_completed_callbacks_.empty()) return;
5834 // Fire callbacks. Increase call depth to prevent recursive callbacks.
5835 v8::Isolate::SuppressMicrotaskExecutionScope suppress(isolate);
5836 std::vector<CallCompletedCallback> callbacks(call_completed_callbacks_);
5837 for (auto& callback : callbacks) {
5838 callback(reinterpret_cast<v8::Isolate*>(this));
5839 }
5840}

5842#ifdef V8_ENABLE_WEBASSEMBLY
5843void Isolate::WasmInitJSPIFeature() {
5844 if (IsUndefined(root(RootIndex::kActiveContinuation))) {
5845 std::unique_ptr<wasm::StackMemory> stack(
5846 wasm::StackMemory::GetCurrentStackView(this));
5847 this->wasm_stacks() = stack.get();
5848 if (v8_flags.trace_wasm_stack_switching) {
5849 PrintF("Set up native stack object (limit: %p, base: %p)\n",
5850 stack->jslimit(), reinterpret_cast<void*>(stack->base()));
5851 }
5852 HandleScope scope(this);
5853 Handle<WasmContinuationObject> continuation = WasmContinuationObject::New(
5854 this, std::move(stack), wasm::JumpBuffer::Active, AllocationType::kOld);
5855 heap()
5856 ->roots_table()
5857 .slot(RootIndex::kActiveContinuation)
5858 .store(*continuation);
5859 }
5860}
5861#endif

5873 PromiseHookFields::HasIsolatePromiseHook::encode(promise_hook_) |
5874 PromiseHookFields::HasAsyncEventDelegate::encode(async_event_delegate_) |
5875 PromiseHookFields::IsDebugActive::encode(debug()->is_active());

5878 UpdatePromiseHookProtector();
5879 }
